properties.areaDesc: Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac MI; Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI; Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 17 at 4:03AM EST until February 18 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 20 knots from the south with
gusts up to 30 knots. The largest significant waves will be 5
feet with a potential maximum wave height of 7 feet.

* WHERE...Port Austin to Harbor Beach, Harbor Beach to Port
Sanilac and Port Sanilac to Port Huron.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 1 AM EST Tuesday
with the largest waves expected around 3 AM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY
